name: Safebox-Lite v0.0.2
body:
**SafeBox-Lite** is a Javascript library which helps you to run your Javascript function in isolated
execution context. It has following features which helps the programmer to run their code-snippet
and plugin in safer way.

* Provide Isolated Execution.
* Everything in local variable; a perfect GC friendly.
* In-built internal soft cache gives safer place to store code-snippet with performance.
* A better place to keep your class/constructor with flexible portability.

For more information [Get PDF Here](https://github.com/hilarudeens/SafeBox-Lite/blob/master/Documentation/SafeBox-Lite-v0.0.2.pdf?raw=true)
